headline: RBC Capital Lifts HCA Healthcare, Inc. (HCA) Price Target Following Robust Revenue and Earnings Growth
summary: HCA Healthcare Inc. (NYSE:HCA) is one of the best blue-chip stocks to buy now. On October 27, analysts at RBC Capital reiterated an Outperform rating on HCA Healthcare Inc. (NYSE:HCA) and raised the price target to $482 from $449. The price target was raised following the company’s strong third‑quarter results, reported on October 24, which […]
